titleStmt.title: Copy of an act presented to the Parliament by the merchants
titleStmt.author: Company of Scotland Trading to Africa and the Indies.

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication suggested by Wing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in: National Library of Scotland.
The draft of an act which was passed in May 1695. It called for the formation of a joint stock company to trade with Africa and the Indies.
